code: import React from'react';var STYLES=['normal--400','bold--700','lighter--100','bolder--800','subtitle'];var SIZES=['heading--h1','heading--h2','heading--h3','heading--h4','heading--h5','heading--h6','heading--large','heading--medium','heading--small'];var Title=function Title(props){var children=props.children,type=props.type,headingStyle=props.headingStyle,headingSize=props.headingSize;var checkTitleStyle=STYLES.includes(headingStyle)?headingStyle:STYLES[0];var checkTitleSize=SIZES.includes(headingSize)?headingSize:SIZES[0];return React.createElement("span",{className:"title ".concat(checkTitleStyle," ").concat(checkTitleSize)},children);};export default Title;
